author: cms-sw
body: This should fix the env issue reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38605 . Missing extra lib/plugins for `haswell` ( as reported [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38605#issuecomment-1176404585) ) needs more changes which will come later
title: Multi-arch IBs env fix for patch releases
